item.title: 5. Passive and Active Current Mirror
item.description:
Basic Current Mirrors

电路

  • $\mu_n, C_{ox},W$ 一致

  • $L$可以不同以表示增益

电流增益

$$ \begin{aligned} I_{out} &= \frac{1}{2} \mu_n C_{ox} (W/L)1 (V{GS2} - V_{T2})^2 \\ I_{REF} &= \frac{1}{2} \mu_n C_{ox} (W/L)2 (V{GS1} - V_{T2})^2 \\ \therefore I_{out} &= \frac{(W/L)_2}{(W/L)1} \cdot I{REF} \end{aligned} $$

电压增益(其他电路)

  • $M_2,M_3$ 构成BCM, $M_1$是CS，$R_L$是$R_{out}$

$$ A_v = g_{m1} \frac{(W/L)_1}{(W/L)_2}R_L $$

Cascode Current Mirrors

目的和设计

目的

  • 减少Channel Lengeh Modulation的影响

设计

  1. 为了保证$I_{out}$与$I_{out}$高精度相等，必须使得$V_X = V_Y$,即$V_b - V_{GS3} = V_b - V_{GS1}$

  1. 选择适当的MOSFET使得$\dfrac{(W/L)_3}{(W/L)_0} = \dfrac{(W/L)2}{(W/L)1}$, 这样可以满足$V_X = V_Y$, 从而$I{REF} = I{out}$,
  • 所有MOSFET的$V_{TH}$相等

  1. $V_p$的最小值

$$ \begin{aligned} V_p &\ge V_N - V_{TH} \\ V_p &\ge V_{GS0} + V_{GS1} - V_{TH} \\ V_p &\ge V_{OV1} + V_{OV0} + V_{TH} \end{aligned} $$

  1. 结果
  • 两个Basic Current Mirror侧向拼在一起

源电流的求解

  • $I_{REF}$工作的最小电压为$aV$

$$ \begin{aligned} V_N &= V_{GS0} + V_{GS1} \\ &= \sqrt{\frac{2I_{REF}}{k_{n0}}} - \sqrt{\frac{2I_{REF}}{k_{n1}}} + V_{TH1} + V_{TH0} \\ \because V_{DD} - V_N &= 0.5V \\ \therefore I_{REF} &= \frac{1}{2}\mu_nC_{ox}\frac{(V_{DD} - V_{TH1} - V_{TH2} - 0.5)^2}{(\sqrt{(L/W)_0} + \sqrt{(L/W)_1})^2} \end{aligned} $$

Active Current Mirrors

Voltage Gain

Method I

  • For (b)

$$ \begin{aligned} |A_v| &= G_m R_{out} \\ G_m &= \frac{I_{out}}{V_{in}} \\ &= \frac{\dfrac{1}{2} g_{m1} V_{in}}{V_{in}} \\ &= \frac{1}{2}g_{m1} \end{aligned} $$

  • For (c), A CS Stage with Source Degeneration

$$ \begin{aligned} R_2 &= 2r_{o2} + \frac{1}{g_{m1}} \\ &\approx 2r_{o2} \\ \therefore R_{out} &\approx 2r_{o2} || r_{o4} \\ \therefore |A_v| &\approx \frac{g_{m1}}{2} (2r_{o2} || r_{o4}) \end{aligned} $$

Method II

$$ \begin{aligned} A_v &= \frac{V_{out}}{V_{in}} \\ &= \frac{V_{out}}{V_p} \times \frac{V_P}{V_{in}} \\ \frac{V_P}{V_{in}} &= \frac{R_{eq}}{R_{eq} + \dfrac{1}{g_{m1}}} \\ R_{eq} &= \frac{1}{g_{m2}} + \frac{r_{o4}}{g_{m2}r_{o2}} \\ &= \frac{1}{g_{m2}}(1+\frac{r_{o4}}{r_{o2}}) \\ \therefore \frac{V_P}{V_{in}} &= \frac{1 + \dfrac{r_{o4}}{r_{o2}}}{2 + \dfrac{r_{o4}}{r_{o2}}} \\ \frac{V_{out}}{V_p} &= \frac{r_{o2} + \dfrac{1}{g_{m2}}}{R_{eq}} \\ &= \frac{1 + g_{m2}r_{o2}}{1 + \dfrac{r_{o2}}{r_{o4}}} \\ &\approx \frac{g_{m2}r_{o2}}{1 + \dfrac{r_{o2}}{r_{o4}}} \\ \therefore |A_v| &= \frac{g_{m2}}{2} [(2r_{o2}) || r_{o4}] \end{aligned} $$

item.title: 9. Operational Amplifier
item.description:
Simple Feedback Circuit

Relative Gain Error

G Actual Gain
A Ideal Gain

$$ \begin{aligned} RGE &= \frac{G - A}{A} \times 100% \\ &= \frac{\dfrac{A}{1 + A\beta} - \dfrac{1}{\beta}}{\dfrac{1}{\beta}} \times 100% \\ &= - \frac{1}{1 + A\beta} \end{aligned} $$

Small Signal Bandwidth

  • The time required to reach 1% of its final value

$$ \begin{aligned} H(s) &= \frac{V_{out}}{V_{in}} \\ &= \frac{A(s)}{1 + A(s)\beta} \\ &= \frac{\dfrac{A_0}{1 + \dfrac{s}{\omega_0}}}{1 + \dfrac{A_0}{1 + \dfrac{s}{\omega_0}}\beta} \\ &=\frac{A_0}{1 + \dfrac{s}{\omega_0} + A_0\beta} \\ &= \frac{\dfrac{A_0}{1 + A_0 \beta}}{1 + \dfrac{s}{(1 + A_0\beta)\omega_0}} \\ \therefore \tau &= \frac{1}{(1+A_0\beta)\omega_0} \\because \beta &= \frac{R_2}{R_1 + R_2} (In \ this \ case) \\ Also, \ A_0\beta &\gg 1 \\ \therefore \tau &\approx (1+\frac{R_1}{R_2})\frac{1}{A_0\omega_0} \\ Step \ Response: \\ V_{in} &= au(t) \\ V_{out} &= a(1 + \frac{R_1}{R_2}) (1 - e^{-\frac{t}{\tau}})u(t) \\ V_F &= a(1 + \frac{R_1}{R_2}) \\ \therefore let \ 1 - e^{-\frac{t}{\tau}} &=0.01 \\ t &= 4.6 \tau \end{aligned} $$

item.title: 6. Frequency Response
item.description:
General Considerations

Miller’s Law

  1. 对于图(b), 若$A$为增益, 可得出Miller’s Law

$$ \begin{aligned} Z_1 &= \frac{1}{1-A} Z \\ Z_2 &= \frac{1}{1 - A^{-1}}Z \\\ \end{aligned} $$

  1. 对于图(a)

$$ \begin{aligned} Z_1 &= \frac{1}{s(1 + A)C_F} \\ \therefore C_{in} &= (1+A)C_F \\ \end{aligned} $$

  1. 对于图(c)

$$ \begin{aligned} Q_{in} &= C_F(-A\Delta V - \Delta V) \\ &= -(1+A)C_F\Delta V \\ \therefore C_{in} &= (1+A) C_F \end{aligned} $$

Association of Poles with Nodes

General Case

$$ \begin{aligned} H(s) &= \frac{V_{out}}{V_{in}}(s) \\ &= \frac{A_1}{1 + sR_SC_{in}} \frac{A_2}{1 + sR_1 C_N}\frac{1}{1 + sR_2C_P} \end{aligned} $$

Input Example

$$ \begin{aligned} Input \ Impedence \ Z_{in} &= (1+A) C_F \\ f_p &= \frac{1}{(1+A)R_SC_F} \end{aligned} $$

CG Stage With Parasitic Capacitances

$$ \begin{aligned} \omega_{in} &= [C_S (R_S || \frac{1}{g_{m1} + g_{mb1}})]^{-1} \\ &= [(C_{GS1} + C_{SB1})(R_S || \frac{1}{g_{m1} + g_{mb1}})]^{-1} \\ \omega_{out} &= [C_D R_D]^{-1} \\ &= [(C_{DG} + C_{DB}) R_D]^{-1} \\ \therefore A_v &= \frac{(g_m + g_{mb})R_D}{1 + (g_m + g_{mb})R_S} \frac{1}{1 + s/\omega_{in}}\frac{1}{1 + s/\omega_{out}} \end{aligned} $$

Common-Source Stage

Input/Output Frequency

电路图

Nodes

  • $C_{GD}$接在了输入和输出之间，因此根据Miller’s Law分别计算输出和输入阻抗

$$ \begin{aligned} X \ to \ ground \\ Z_X &= C_{GS} + (1-A)C_{GD} \\ \omega_{in} &= \frac{1}{R_S [C_{GS} + (1 + g_mR_D)C_{GD}]} \\ V_{out} \ to \ ground \\ Z_X &= C_{DB} + (1-A^{-1})C_{GD} \\ &\approx C_{DB} + C_{GD} \\ \therefore \omega_{out} &= \frac{1}{R_S(C_{GS} + C_{GD})} \end{aligned} $$

$R_S$ is large

$$ \begin{aligned} Z_X &= \frac{1}{sC_{eq}} || ( \frac{C_{GD} + C_{GS}}{C_{GD}} \frac{1}{g_m}) (???) \\ \therefore \omega_{out} &= \frac{1}{\Big[ R_D || \Big(\dfrac{C_{GD} + C_{GS}}{C_{GD}} \dfrac{1}{g_m}\Big) \Big] (C_{eq} + C_{DB})} \\ \therefore \frac{V_{out}}{V_{in}}(s) &= -\frac{g_mR_D}{(1 + \dfrac{s}{\omega_{in}}) (1 + \dfrac{s}{\omega_{out}})} \end{aligned} $$

Exact Transfer Function

  1. KCL方程

$$ \begin{aligned} 0 &= V_X sC_{GS} + (V_X - V_{in})/R_S + (V_X - V_{out})sC_{GD} \\ 0 &= V_{out} (\frac{1}{R_D} + C_{DB}) + (V_{out} - V_X)sC_{GD} \\ 解得 \ V_X &= -\frac{V_{out} [s(C_{GD} + C_{DB}) + \dfrac{1}{R_D}]}{g_m - sC_{GD}} \\ \therefore \ H(s) &= \frac{V_{out}}{V_{in}} \\ &= \frac{(C_{GD}s - g_m)R_D}{R_SR_D\xi s^2 + [R_S(1+g_mR_D)C_{GD} + R_SC_{GS} + R_D(C_{GD} + C_{DB})]s + 1} \\ \xi &= C_{GS}C_{GD} + C_{GS}C_{DB} + C_{GD}C_{DB} \\ \end{aligned} $$

Two Pole Systems

  • $D$: demoninator，分母

$$ \begin{aligned} D &= (1 + \frac{s}{\omega_{p1}})(1 + \frac{s}{\omega_{p2}}) \\ &= \frac{s^2}{\omega_{p1}\omega_{p2}} + (\frac{1}{\omega_{p1}} + \frac{1}{\omega_{p2}})s + 1 \\ \end{aligned} $$

  • 因为$\omega_{p2} \gg \omega_{p1}$，所以我们可以将s的系数近似看成$\dfrac{1}{\omega_{p1}}$

  • 进而根据$s^2$的系数求出$\omega_{p2}$

  1. 对于CS Stage, 有以下结论

$$ \begin{aligned} \omega_{p1} &= \frac{1}{R_S(1+g_mR_D)C_{GD} + R_SC_{GS} + R_D(C_{GD} + C_{DB})} \\ \omega_{p2} &= \frac{1}{\omega_{p1}} \frac{1}{R_S R_D \xi} \\ &= \frac{R_S(1+g_mR_D)C_{GD} + R_SC_{GS} + R_D(C_{GD} + C_{DB})}{R_SR_D\xi} \\ 若 C_{GS} &\gg (1+g_m R_D)C_{GD} + R_D(C_{GD} + C_{DB})/R_S \\ \omega_{p2} &\approx \frac{1}{R_D (C_{GD} + C_{DB})} \end{aligned} $$

  1. 总结
  • the “output” pole approach is valid only if $C_{GS}$ dominates the response

Source Followers

电路

Transfer Function and Poles

  1. KCL

$$ \begin{aligned} V_1C_{GS}s + g_mV_1 &= V_{out}C_Ls \\ \therefore V_1 &= \frac{C_Ls}{g_m + C_{GS}s}V_{out} \end{aligned} $$

  1. KVL

$$ \begin{aligned} V_{in} &= R_S[V_1C_{GS}s + (V_1 + V_{out})C_{GD}s] + V_1 + V_{out} \end{aligned} $$

  1. Gain

$$ \begin{aligned} \therefore \frac{V_{out}}{V_{in}}(s) &= \frac{g_m + C_{GS}s}{R_S\xi s^2 + (g_mR_SC_{GD} + C_L + C_{GS})s + g_m} \end{aligned} $$

  1. Poles

$$ \begin{aligned} \therefore \omega_{p1} &\approx \frac{g_m}{g_mR_SC_{GD} + C_L + C_{GS}} \\ &= \frac{1}{R_SC_{GD} + \dfrac{C_L + C_{GS}}{g_m}} \\ if \ R_S &= 0: \\ \omega_{p1} &= \frac{g_m}{C_L + C_{GS}} \end{aligned} $$

Input Impedence

  • $C_{GD}$ shunts the input, neglected.

$$ \begin{aligned} V_X &= \frac{I_X}{C_{GS}s} + (I_X + \frac{g_m I_X}{C_{GS}s}) (\frac{1}{g_{mb}} || \frac{1}{C_Ls}) \\ Z_{in} &= \frac{1}{C_{GS}s} + (1 + \frac{g_m}{C_{GS}s})\frac{1}{g_{mb} + C_L s} \\ Low \ Frequency: \\ g_{mb} &\gg |C_Ls| \\ \therefore Z_{in} &\approx \frac{1}{C_{GS}s}(1 + \frac{g_m}{g_{mb}}) + \frac{1}{g_{mb}} \end{aligned} $$

Common-Gate Stage

$$ \begin{aligned} \frac{V_{out}}{V_{in}}(s) &= \frac{(g_m + g_{mb})R_D}{1 + (g_m + g_{mb})R_S} \frac{1}{\Big(1 + \dfrac{C_S}{g_m + g_{mb} + \dfrac{1}{R_S}}s \Big) (1 + R_DC_D s)} \\ \therefore Z_{in} &\approx \frac{Z_L}{(g_m + g_{mb})r_o} + \frac{1}{g_m + g_{mb}} \\ Z_L &= R_D || [1/(s C_D)] \end{aligned} $$

Cascode Stage

$$ \begin{aligned} \omega_{p,A} &= \frac{1}{R_S \Big[C_{GS1} + \Big( 1 + \dfrac{g_{m1}}{g_{m2} + g_{mb2}})C_{GD1}]} (???)\\ \omega_{p,X} &= \frac{g_{m2} + g_{mb2}}{2C_{GD1} + C_{DB1} + C_{SB1} + C_{GS2}} \\ \omega_{p,Y} &= \frac{1}{R_D(C_{DB2} + C_L + C_{GD2})} \end{aligned} $$

item.title: 4. Differential Amplifiers
item.description:
Single-Ended & Differential Signal

  • CM-level: Center Voltage (图中的虚线)

Basic Differential Pair

  • Bias Current Source $I_{SS}$ : Reducing the Variation of CM level

Qualitative Analysis

  1. $V_{out} - V_{in}$ 图像

$$ \begin{aligned} V_{in1} - V_{in2} &\in (-\infin, + \infin) \end{aligned} $$

  1. Other Characteristics

$$ \begin{aligned} 为了使M_3&工作在饱和区 \\ V_P &\ge V_{GS3} - V_{TH3} \\ V_{in,CM} - V_{GS1} &\ge V_{GS3} - V_{TH3} \\ \therefore V_{in,CM} &\ge V_{GS1} + V_{OV3} \\\ \\ 为了使M1,M2&工作在饱和区 \\ V_{D1} &\ge V_{G1} - V_{T1} \\ \therefore V_{in,CM} &\le V_{out1} + V_{TH1} = V_{DD}- \frac{I_{SS}}{2} R_D + V_{TH1} \\\ \\ V_{GS1} + (V_{GS3} - V_{TH3} ) &\le V_{in,CM} \le min \Big[ V_{DD}-\frac{I_{SS}}{2}R_D + V_{TH1, V_{DD}} \Big] \end{aligned} $$

  1. $|A_v| - V_{in,CM}$ 图像

Quantitative Analysis

Differential Voltage Gain

  • 当$M_1$和$M_2$都工作在Satuartion Region时，有以下分析:

$$ \begin{aligned} V_{in1} - V_{in2} &= V_{G1} - V_{G2} \\ V_{GS} - V_t&= \sqrt{\frac{2I}{k_n}} \\ (V_{in1} - V_{in2})^2 &= \frac{2}{k_n} (I_{SS} - 2\sqrt{I_{D1} I_{D2}}) \\ \frac{1}{2}k_n(V_{in1} - V_{in2})^2 &= I_{SS} - 2\sqrt{I_{D1}I_{D2}} \\ \because 4I_{D1}I_{D2} &= (I_{D1} + I_{D2})^2 - (I_{D1} - I_{D2})^2 \\ &= I_{SS}^2 - (I_{D1} - I_{D2})^2 \\ \therefore (I_{D1} - I_{D2})^2 &= I_{SS}^2 - 4I_{D1}I_{D2} \\ &= I_{SS}^2 - (I_{SS} - \frac{1}{2}k_n(V_{in1} - V_{in2})^2)^2 \\ &= I_{SS}k_n(V_{in1} - V_{in2})^2 - \frac{1}{4}k_n^2(V_{in1} -V_{in2})^4 \\ \therefore I_{D1} - I_{D2} &= \frac{1}{2}k_n(V_{in1} - V_{in2})\sqrt{\frac{4I_{SS}}{k_n} - (V_{in1} - V_{in2})^2} \\ \therefore \Delta I_{D} &= \frac{1}{2} k_n\Delta V_{in} \sqrt{\frac{4I_{SS}}{k_n} - \Delta V_{in}^2} \\\ \\ A_v &= \frac{\partial \Delta I_D}{\partial \Delta V_{in}} = \frac{1}{2} k_n \dfrac{\dfrac{4I_{SS}}{k_n} - 2\Delta V_{in}^2}{\sqrt{\dfrac{4I_{SS}}{k_n} - \Delta V_{in}^2}} \\ 当\Delta V_{in} &= 0 时: \\ G_m &= \sqrt{k_nI_{SS}}\\ |A_v| &= \sqrt{k_nI_{SS}} R_D \\ 当 \Delta V_{in} &= \sqrt{\frac{2I_{SS}}{k_n}}时: \\ G_m &= 0 \\ V_{GS} &= \sqrt{\frac{I_{SS}}{k_n}} + V_T \\ 当\Delta V_{in} &= \sqrt{\frac{4I_{SS}}{k_n}}时: \\ M_1, M_2 &\ not \ in \ Satuartion \ Region \end{aligned} $$

Voltage Gain

  • 下图中，$M_1$与$M_2$相同，$R_{D1} = R_{D2}$
  1. 左电路的等效电路 (CS Stage With Source Degeneration)

  1. 右电路的等效电路 (CG Stage)

$$ \begin{aligned} R_S &= \frac{1}{g_{m2}}, R_T = \frac{1}{g_{m1}} \\ \frac{V_X}{V_{in1}} &= -\frac{R_{D1}}{\dfrac{1}{g_{m1}} + \dfrac{1}{g_{m2}}} \\ \frac{V_Y}{V_{in1}} &= \frac{R_{D2}}{\dfrac{1}{g_{m1}} + \dfrac{1}{g_{m2}}} \\ A_v &=\frac{V_X - V_Y}{V_{in1} - V_{in2}} \\ &= -g_m R_D \end{aligned} $$

对于线性电路，$V_P$虚接地

  • 假设(a)图输入电压以图(b)所视方式变化

$$ \begin{aligned} V_{in1} = V_0 + \Delta V_{in}, V_{in2} &= V_0 - \Delta V_{in} \\ V_1 = V_a + V_1, \Delta V_2 &= V_a - \Delta V_2 \\ \because I_1 + I_2 &= I_T \\ \therefore g_m(\Delta V_1 + \Delta V_2) &= 0 \\ \therefore \Delta V_1 &= - \Delta V_2 \\\ \\ V_{in1} - V_1 &= V_{in2} - V_2 = V_P \\ V_{in1} + \Delta V_{in} - (V_a + \Delta V_1) &= V_{in2} - \Delta V_{in} - (V_a - \Delta V_2) \\ \therefore \Delta V_{in} &= \Delta V_1 \\ \therefore V_P&不变 \end{aligned} $$

  • $P$ is a Virtual Ground

Common-Mode Response (Small-Signal Model)

Common-Mode Gain

$$ \begin{aligned} A_v &= \frac{\dfrac{R_D}{2}}{\dfrac{1}{2g_m} + R_{SS}} \\ G_m &= \frac{g_m}{1 + 2g_m R_{SS}} \end{aligned} $$

Considering the Manufactured Difference

$$ \begin{aligned} M_1 和 M_2 若不同 \\ V_P &= (g_{m1} + g_{m2})(V_{in,CM} - V_P)R_{ss} \\ \therefore V_P &= \frac{g_{m1} + g_{m2}}{1 + (g_{m1} + g_{m2})R_{SS}} R_{SS} \\ V_X &= g_{m1}R_D(V_{in,CM} - V_P) \\ &= \frac{-g_{m1}}{1 + (g_{m1} + g_{m2})R_{SS}}R_D V_{in,CM} \\ V_Y &= \frac{-g_{m2}}{1 + (g_{m1} + g_{m2})R_{SS}}R_D V_{in,CM} \\ \therefore A_{CM-DM} &= \frac{V_X - V_Y}{V_{in,CM}} \\ &= \frac{\Delta g_m R_D}{1 + (g_{m1} +g_{m2}) R_{SS}} \\ 将R_{SS} 替换为C_S \\ A_{CM-DM} &= \frac{\Delta g_m R_D}{\sqrt{1 + (g_{m1} + g_{m2})^2 \Big|\dfrac{1}{\omega C_S}\Big|^2} } \\ A_{DM} &= -g_m R_D \\ CMRR &= \frac{A_{DM}}{A_{CM-DM}} \\ &= \frac{g_m}{\Delta g_m}(1 + 2g_mR_{ss}) \\ 其中, g_m &= \frac{g_{m1} + g_{m2}}{2} \end{aligned} $$

All Gains

$$ \begin{aligned} A_{DM} &= -g_mR_D \\ A_{CM} &= \frac{\dfrac{R_D}{2}}{R_{SS} + \dfrac{1}{2g_m}} \\ A_{CM-DM} &= \dfrac{\Delta g_m R_D}{1 + (g_{m1} + g_{m2})R_{SS}} \\ CMRR &= \frac{A_{DM}}{A_{CM-DM}} \end{aligned} $$

Differential Pair With MOS Loads

Differential Pair With Diode-Connected and Common-Source Loads

$$ \begin{aligned} For \ (a) \\ A_v &= -g_{mN} (\frac{1}{g_{mP}} || r_{oP} || r_{oN}) \\ & \approx -\frac{g_{mN}}{g_{mP}} \\ For \ (b) \\ A_v &= -g_{mN} (r_{oP} || r_{oN}) \end{aligned} $$

Addition of current sources to increase the voltage gain

$$ |A_v| \approx g_{m1} [(g_{m3}r_{o3}r_{o1}) || (g_{m5}r_{o5}r_{o7})] $$

  • 电压增益可以近似地表示为晶体管的跨导和输出阻抗的乘积

Gilbert Cell

原理

  • Differential Gain 取决于 Tail Current $I_{SS}$ 和 Differential Voltage $\Delta V$

Simple VGAs (Variable Gain Amplifiers)

Gilbert Cell

  • (d)是(c)的化简

$$ \begin{aligned} For (a) \\ V_{out} &= A_1 V_{cont1} + A_2 V_{cont2} \\ &= R_D(I_{D1} + I_{D4}) - R_D(I_{D2} + I_{D3}) \end{aligned} $$

Degeneration Resistance

  • Make the system more stable, able to resist degredation

VGA (Variable-Gain Amplifier)

静态电流损耗

静态电流损耗可能会影响电路的性能，并导致功率损耗和热量产生。为了减少静态电流损耗，可以采取以下措施：

  • 选择$\dfrac{1}{g_m}$和$r_o$较小的 MOSFET。

  • 将$V_G$保持在最小值，以减少电路总电阻。

  • 通过使用负反馈电路来控制 MOSFET 的电流，从而减少静态电流损耗。

item.title: 3. Single Stage Amplifier
item.description:
CS Stage

CS Stage With Resistive Load

图示

分析$A$和$V_{out}$

$$ V_{in} = V_{GS}, V_{out} = V_{DS} \\\ \\ V_{out} = \begin{cases} V_{DD} (没有压降) & V_{in} \lt V_t \\ V_{DD} -\frac{1}{2}k_n (V_{in} - V_t)^2 R_D & V_{in} \ge V_t \\ V_{in} - V_t & V_{in} - V_t = V_{out} \\ V_{DD} - \frac{1}{2}[2(V_{in} - V_t)V_{out}- V_{out}^2] R_D & Triode \ Region \end{cases} \\\ \\ 如果V_{in}很大,使得V_{out} \ll 2(V_{in} -V_t) \\\ \\ \begin{aligned} V_{out} &= \frac{R_{on}}{R_{on} + R_D}V_{DD} \\ &= \frac{V_{DD}}{1 + k_n R_D(V_{in} -V_t)} \\ ( R_{on} &= \frac{V_{out}}{i_D},i_D = k_nR_D(V_{in}-V_t)V_{out} ) \\\ \\ Saturation \ Gain: \\ A_v &= \frac{\partial V_{out}}{\partial V_{in}}\\ &= -g_m R_D \end{aligned} $$

Important Relations

Gain in Channel Length Modulation

$$ V_{out} = V_{DD} - \frac{1}{2}k_n(V_{in} - V_t)^2 (1 + \lambda V_{out})R_D \\\ \\ \begin{aligned} A_v &= \frac{\partial V_{out}}{\partial V_{in}}\\ &= - R_Dk_n (V_{in} - V_t)(1 + \lambda V_{out})- \frac{1}{2}k_n R_D(V_{in} - V_t)^2 \lambda\frac{\partial V_{out}}{\partial V_{in}} \\ &= -R_D g_m - I_DR_D \lambda A_v (近似) \\ &= -\frac{g_m R_D}{1 + R_D \lambda I_D} \\ &= -g_m \frac{r_0R_D}{r_0 + R_D} \end{aligned}$$

CS Stage With Diode-Connected Load

电路 + 电阻粗略计算

$$ \begin{aligned} V_1 &= V_X \\ I_X &= \frac{V_X}{r_0} + g_mV_X \\ Z_{in} &=\frac{V_X}{I_X} \\ &\approx \frac{1}{g_m} \end{aligned} $$

电阻精确测量

$$ \begin{aligned} Impedence: (\frac{1}{g_m} || r_0) &\approx \frac{1}{g_m} \\ V_1 &= V_{bs} = -V_X \\\ I_X &=\frac{V_X}{r_0} + (g_m + g_{mb})V_X \\ \frac{V_X}{I_X} &= \frac{1}{g_m+g_{mb}+r_0^{-1}} \\ &= \frac{1}{g_m + g_{mb}} || r_0 \\ & \approx \frac{1}{g_m +g_{mb}} \\ Z_{in} &\approx \frac{1}{g_m + g_{mb}} \end{aligned} $$

Gain

  1. Method I

$$ \begin{aligned} A_v &= -g_{m1} \frac{1}{g_{m2} + g_{mb2}} \\ &= -\frac{g_{m1}}{g_{m2}}\frac{1}{1 + \eta} \\ \Big( \eta&=\frac{g_{mb2}}{g_{m2}} = \frac{\partial V_{TH}}{\partial V_{out}} \Big) \\ \because I_{D1} &= I_{D2} \\ \therefore A_v &= \frac{\sqrt{2k_nI_{D1}}}{\sqrt{2k_nI_{D2}}}\frac{1}{1+\eta} \\ &= -\sqrt{\frac{(W/L)_1}{(W/L)_2}}\frac{1}{1+\eta} \end{aligned} $$

  1. Method II

$$ \begin{aligned} I_{D1} &= I_{D2} \\ \frac{1}{2}k_{n1}(V_{in} - V_{t1})^2 &= \frac{1}{2}k_{n2}(V_{DD} - V_{out} -V_{t2})^2 \\ \sqrt{(\frac{W}{L})1} (V{in} -V_{t1}) &= \sqrt{(\frac{W}{L})2}(V{DD} - V_{out} - V_{t2}) \\ \sqrt{(\frac{W}{L})1} &= -\sqrt{(\frac{W}{L})2}(\frac{\partial V{out}}{\partial V{in}} - \frac{\partial V_{t2}}{\partial V_{in}}) \\ \because \frac{\partial V_{t2}}{\partial V_{in}} &= \frac{\partial V_{t2}}{\partial V_{out}} \frac{\partial V_{out}}{\partial V_{in}} = \eta\frac{\partial V_{out}}{\partial V_{in}} \\ \therefore A_v &= \frac{\partial V_{out}}{V_{in}} \\ &= -\sqrt{\frac{(W/L)_1}{(W/L)_2}}\frac{1}{1+\eta} \\ &\approx -\sqrt{\frac{(W/L)_1}{(W/L)_2}} \end{aligned} $$

  1. 总结
  • 不考虑Channel-Length-Modulation和Body Effect的情况下，$A_v = 1$

CS stage with diode-connected PMOS device

$$ \begin{aligned} \because I_{D1} & = I_{D2} \\ \therefore k_nV_{ovn}^2 &= k_pV_{ovp}^2 \\ \therefore \frac{\mu_n (W/L)n}{\mu_p(W/L)p} &= \frac{|V{ovp}|}{V{ovn}} \\ \therefore A_v &\approx -\frac{|V_{GS2} - V_{TH2}|}{V_{GS1} - V_{TH1}} \\ &\approx -\frac{k_n|V_{GS2} - V_{TH2}|}{V_{GS1} - V_{TH1}} \\ &\approx \frac{g_{mn}}{g_{mp}} \end{aligned} $$

  • 在考虑现实因素的情况下，$A_v = -g_{m1} (\frac{1}{g_{m2}} || r_{o1} || r_{o2})$

CS Stage With Current-Source Load

$$ \begin{aligned} A_v &= -g_m(r_{o1} || r_{o2}) \\ Intrinsic \ Gain: \ g_mr_o &= \sqrt{2(\frac{W}{L})\mu_nC_{OX}I_D} \frac{1}{\lambda I_D} \end{aligned} $$

CS Stage With Triode Load

$$ \begin{aligned} R_{on2} &= \frac{1}{g_{m2}} \\ &= \frac{1}{\mu_p C_{OX}(W/L)2(V{DD} -V_b-V_{Tp})} \end{aligned} $$

CS Stage With Source Degeneration

电路

简化分析

$$ 设I_D = f(V_{GS}) \\\ \\ \begin{aligned} G_m &= \frac{\partial I_D}{\partial V_{in}} \\ &= \frac{\partial f}{\partial V_{GS}}\frac{\partial V_{GS}}{\partial V_{in}} \\ &= g_m(\frac{ \partial (V_{in} - I_DR_S)}{\partial V_{in}}) \\ &= g_m (1-R_S\frac{\partial I_D}{\partial V_{in}}) \\ &= g_m(1 -R_SG_m) \\ \therefore G_m &= \frac{g_m}{1+g_mR_S} \\ &= \frac{1}{\dfrac{1}{g_m} + R_S} \\\ \\ \therefore A_v &= -G_m R_D \\ &= -\frac{g_mR_D}{1 + g_mR_S} \end{aligned} $$

具体分析

  • 考虑了Channel Length Modulation和Body Effect
  1. 电路

  1. 等效跨导

$$ \begin{aligned} I_{out} &= g_mV_1 - \frac{I_{out} R_S}{r_O} -g_mV_X \\ &= g_m (V_{in} - I_{out} R_S) - \frac{I_{out}R_S}{r_O} + g_m (-I_{out}R_S) \\ G_m &= \frac{I_{out}}{V_{in}} \\ &= \frac{g_mr_o}{R_S + [1 + (g_m + g_{mb})R_S]r_O} \end{aligned} \\\ $$

  1. 增大的输出电阻

$$ \begin{aligned} I_{ro} &= I_X - g_m(V_1 + V_{bs}) \\ V_1 &= - I_XR_S \\ \therefore V_X &= I_{ro} r_o + I_X R_S \\ \therefore R_{out} &= \frac{V_X}{I_X} \\ &= R_S + [1 + (g_m + g_{mb}) R_S]r_o \end{aligned} $$

  1. 最终增益

$$ \begin{aligned} A_v &= \frac{V_{out}}{V_{in}} \\ &= -\frac{g_m r_o R_D}{R_D + R_S + r_o + (g_m + g_{mb}) R_S r_o} \end{aligned} $$

图像

CS Stage With Source Degeneration & Constant Current Source

$$ \begin{aligned} A_v &= -g_m r_o \end{aligned} $$

  • 这种情况下，$R_S$不起作用了，通过$R_S$的小电流为0

Source Follower

电路 电压特性

  • 只考虑Body Effect

$$ \begin{aligned} V_{out} &= \frac{1}{2}k_n(V_{in} -V_{out} -V_t) ^2 R_S \\ \frac{\partial V_{out}}{\partial V_{in}} &= k_n(V_{in}- V_{out} -V_t) (1 - \frac{\partial V_{out}}{\partial V_{in}} - \frac{\partial V_t}{\partial V_{in}}) R_S \\ \because \frac{\partial V_t}{\partial V_{in}} &= \eta \frac{\partial V_{out}}{\partial V_{in}} \\ \therefore \frac{\partial V_{out}}{\partial V_{in}} &= \frac{k_nV_{OV}R_S}{1+k_nV_{OV}R_S(1 +\eta)} \\ \because g_m &= k_nV_{OV} \\ \therefore A_v &= \frac{g_m R_S}{1 + (g_m + g_{mb}) R_S} \end{aligned} $$

  • 若不考虑Body Effect，$A_v = \dfrac{1}{\dfrac{1}{g_m} + R_S} R_S$, 和CS Degeneration十分相似

输出电阻

  • 只考虑Body Effect

$$ \begin{aligned} V_X &= - V_1 = -V_{bs}\\ I_X &= g_mV_1 + g_{mb} V_{bs} \\ \therefore R_{out} &= \frac{V_X}{I_X} \\ &= \frac{1}{g_m + g_{mb}} \\ &= \frac{1}{g_m} || \frac{1}{g_{mb}} \end{aligned} $$

Source Follower Driving Resistive Load

  • 考虑了CLM和Body Effect

$$ \begin{aligned} A_v &= \frac{\dfrac{1}{g_{mb}} || r_{o1} || r_{o2} || R_L }{\dfrac{1}{g_{mb}} || r_{o1} || r_{o2} || R_L + \dfrac{1}{g_m}} \end{aligned} $$

Common-Gate Stage

电路

  • (a) 直接耦合

  • (b) 电容耦合

简化后的 Gain

$$ \begin{aligned} V_{out} &= V_{DD} - \frac{1}{2}k_n(V_b -V_{in} -V_t)^2R_D \\ \therefore A_v &= \frac{\partial V_{out}}{\partial V_{in}} \\ &= -k_nV_{OV}(-1-\eta) R_D \\ &= g_m(1+\eta) R_D \end{aligned} $$

普适性的Gain

$$ \begin{aligned} V_1 - \frac{V_{out}}{R_D} R_S + V_{in} &=0 \\ V_{out} &=V_{in} -\frac{V_{out}}{R_D} R_S + (V_1(g_m + g_{mb}) - \frac{V_{out}}{R_D})r_o \\ \therefore A_v &=\frac{V_{out}}{V_{in}} = \frac{1 + (g_m + g_{mb})r_o }{r_o + (g_m + g_{mb})r_oR_S + R_S +R_D}R_D \\ if \ R_D &\rightarrow \infin \\ A_v &= 1 + (g_m + g_{mb}) r_o \end{aligned} $$

Input Impedence

$$ \begin{aligned} V_1 &= -V_X \\ V_X + (g_mV_1 + g_{mb}V_{bs} - I_X)r_o &= I_XR_D \\ \therefore R_{in} &= \frac{V_X}{I_X} \\ &= \frac{R_D + r_o}{1 + (g_m + g_{mb})r_o} \\ \because (g_m + g_{mb})r_o &\gg 1 \\ \therefore R_{in }&\approx \frac{R_D}{(g_m + g_{mb})r_o} + \frac{1}{g_m + g_{mb}} \\ if \ R_D &=0 \\ R_{in} &= \frac{1}{g_m + g_{mb} + \dfrac{1}{r_o}} \end{aligned} $$

Output Impedence

$$ \begin{aligned} R_{out} &= \big[ (1 + (g_m + g_{mb})r_o)R_S + r_o \big] || R_D \end{aligned} $$

Cascode Stage

Basic Configuration

电路

  • CS + CG

  • $M_1$: Input Device

  • $M_2$: Cascode Device

Output Voltage Range

  • 为了让$M_1$和$M_2$都工作在饱和区，作出以下分析

$$ \begin{aligned} V_X &\ge V_{in} - V_{T1} \ (1) \\ V_X &= V_b - V_{GS2} \ (2) \\\ \\ 结合(1)(2) \\ V_b -V_{GS2} &\ge V_{in} -V_{T1} \\ V_b &\ge V_{in} - V_{T1} + V_{GS2} \ (3) \\\ \\ V_{out} - V_{S2} &\ge V_b - V_{S2} - V_{T2} \\ V_{out} &\ge V_b - V_{T2} (4)\\ \therefore 结合(3)(4) \\ V_{out} &\ge (V_{in} - V_{T1}+ V_{GS2} -V_{T2}) \\ \therefore V_{out \ min} &= V_{OV1} + V_{OV2} \end{aligned} $$

I/O 特性

Cascode Stage With a Source Resistance

$$ \begin{aligned} I_{D2} &= I_{D1} \frac{R_p}{\dfrac{1}{g_m + g_{mb}} + R_p} \\ &= I_{D1} \frac{(g_m + g_{mb})R_p}{1 + (g_m + g_{mb})R_p} \\ \therefore A_v &= -g_mR_D\frac{(g_m + g_{mb})R_p}{1 + (g_m + g_{mb})R_p} \\ R_{out} &= [1 + (g_{m2} + g_{mb2})r_{o2}]r_{o1} + r_{o2} \end{aligned} $$

Cascode Stage With Current-Source Load

  1. 变换电路

  1. 推导
  • $r_{o1}$ 分走了很多流

$$ \begin{aligned} I_{out} &= g_{m1}V_{in}\frac{r_{o1}}{r_{o1} + r_{o2} || \dfrac{1}{g_m + g_{mb}}} \\ G_m &= \frac{I_{out}}{V_{in}} \\ &= g_{m1}\frac{r_{o1}}{r_{o1} + r_{o2} || \dfrac{1}{g_m + g_{mb}}} \\ |A_v| &= G_m R_{out} \\ &= g_{m1} r_{o1} [1 + (g_{m2} + g_{mb2})r_{o2}] \end{aligned} $$

Folded Cascode

Simple Folded Cascode

$$ \begin{aligned} For \ (b) \\ I_{D2} &= I_1 - \frac{1}{2}k_p(V_{DD} - V_{in1} - |V_{tp}|)^2 \\ I_{D2} & \downarrow \ \Rightarrow I_{D2} = 0 \\ I_1 &= \frac{1}{2}k_p(V_{DD} - V_{in1} - |V_{tp}|)^2 \\ \therefore V_{in1} &= V_{DD} - |V_{tp}| -\sqrt{\frac{2I_{1}}{k_p}} \end{aligned} $$

Folded Cascode With Current Source

$$ R_{out} = \big[ 1 + (g_{m2} + g_{mb2})r_{o2} \big] (r_{o1} || r_{o3}) + r_{o2} $$

附录

Triode Region Resistance

We can approximate $R_{DS}$ as being equal to its maximum value, which is equal to $\dfrac{V_D}{I_D}$. This gives us an equivalent resistance of $R_{on} = \dfrac{V_D}{I_D}$.

MOSFET的电阻

名称 输出电阻 反向输出电阻
符号 $\frac{1}{g_m}$ 或 $r_{ds}$ $r_o$
适用情况 考虑CLM
不适用情况 高频电路

  • 在饱和区，当MOSFET的输入电压足够高，使得MOSFET的通道完全打开，电流受限于外部电路阻抗而不是MOSFET本身。在这种情况下，MOSFET的漏-源电压和漏电流之间的关系可以近似为线性关系，类似于普通的电阻。

  • 一般的, $r_o \gg \frac{1}{g_m}$

Body Effect

the voltage at the body terminal (which is usually connected to the source) affects the threshold voltage of the device. This occurs because of the depletion region that forms between the body and channel regions. When a voltage is applied to the body, it changes the width of this depletion region, which alters the effective thickness of the oxide layer between gate and channel.

$$ \begin{aligned} \eta &= \frac{g_m}{g_{mb}} \\ &=\dfrac{\partial V_{TH}}{\partial V_{in}} \\ &= \frac{\partial V_t}{\partial V_{SB}} \end{aligned} $$

  1. 在考虑Body Effect时, $V_t$是一个随电流变化的参数(一般情况下变化很小，忽略不计)

  2. $g_{mb}V_{bs}$

  • 二极管的反向传输电阻对二极管电流的影响, 其中$g_{mb}$叫做反向跨导, 指栅-漏结电容在反向偏置下存储的电荷引起的漏极电流变化的比例，反映了MOSFET的输入特性。
